meta.title: Nixify - Windows/macOS/Linux ‚Üí NixOS Migration
meta.description: Migrate from Windows/macOS/Linux to NixOS by extracting system information and generating NixOS configurations

declarative.title: ‚ú® Declarative System Configuration
declarative.text: Your entire system is described in a single configuration file. No more manual changes that are forgotten later.

immutable.title: üîí Immutable & Reproducible
immutable.text: Every system generation is immutable and can be restored at any time. Identical systems on different machines.

atomic.title: üîÑ Atomic Updates & Rollbacks
atomic.text: System updates are atomic - either everything works or nothing changes. One-click rollback to any previous generation.

nixify.description: Nixify helps you migrate from Windows/macOS/Linux to NixOS by:

features.programs: üì¶ Detecting all installed programs on your system
features.iso: üíø Optionally: Creating a custom ISO with embedded config

step1.title: Create Snapshot
step1.text: Run the snapshot script on your Windows/macOS/Linux system

step2.title: Upload Report
step2.text: Upload the generated report to this service

step3.title: Generate Config
step3.text: The service automatically generates a NixOS configuration

step4.title: Build ISO (optional)
step4.text: Create a custom NixOS ISO with embedded config

step5.title: Install
step5.text: Install NixOS with the generated configuration

download.instructions: Download the appropriate script for your system and run it:

upload.title: Upload Report & Manage Session
upload.description: After running the snapshot script, upload the generated JSON report here:
upload.drop_zone: üìÅ Drop file here or click to select

kernel_anticheat.title: üõ°Ô∏è Kernel-Level Anti-Cheats
kernel_anticheat.text: Vanguard (Valorant), EasyAntiCheat, BattlEye and similar kernel-level anti-cheats do NOT work under Linux/NixOS.
kernel_anticheat.details: These programs require Windows kernel drivers and cannot be emulated with Wine/Proton.

wine_proton.title: üç∑ Wine & Proton
wine_proton.text: Most Windows programs work with Wine or Proton (for games).
features: Steam with Proton supports thousands of Windows games
Many Windows applications run with Wine
Native Linux alternatives available for most programs

what_works.title: ‚úÖ What works well
items: Development tools (VS Code, Git, Docker, etc.)

about_config.title: üìù About this configuration
about_config.text: This NixOS configuration is based on the NixOS Control Center - a modular system management framework.
features: CLI & TUI tools for system management

footer.tagline: Free all users from Microsoft and Apple üöÄ

mappings.title: Program Mappings
mappings.subtitle: See which programs are supported in NixOS

kernel_anticheat_warning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Kernel-Level Anti-Cheats
kernel_anticheat_warning.text: Vanguard (Valorant), EasyAntiCheat, BattlEye and similar kernel-level anti-cheats do NOT work under Linux/NixOS.
kernel_anticheat_warning.details: These programs require Windows kernel drivers and cannot be emulated with Wine/Proton.

external_resources.title: External Resources
external_resources.description: Check game compatibility on these trusted sources:

proton.title: üç∑ Proton & Wine
proton.text: Most Windows games work with Proton (Steam) or Wine:
features: Steam with Proton supports thousands of Windows games
Many games run perfectly with Wine
Native Linux games work out of the box

architecture.title: üèóÔ∏è Architecture
architecture.intro: NixOS Control Center is built on a declarative, modular architecture using Nix Flakes and Home Manager.

declarative.title: ‚ú® Declarative Configuration
declarative.text: Your entire system is described in code. Every package, service, and setting is defined in Nix files. Changes require rebuilding, but this ensures reproducibility and rollback capabilities.

components.title: Key Components
components.flake: Main entry point using Nix Flakes for reproducible builds
components.modular: Configuration split into reusable modules in configs/
components.modules: Automatic module discovery and registration system

rebuild.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Rebuild Required
rebuild.text: Unlike traditional systems, changes in NixOS require a rebuild. This might feel different at first, but it ensures your system is always in a known, reproducible state.
rebuild.note: Every change is atomic - either everything works or nothing changes. This prevents partial updates and broken states.

process.title: Typical Workflow
process.step4: If something breaks, rollback with 'nixos-rebuild switch --rollback'

roadmap.title: üó∫Ô∏è Roadmap
roadmap.intro: NixOS Control Center is actively developed. Here's what's planned:

reproducible.title: Reproducible
reproducible.text: Identical systems on different machines. Share your config, get the same result.

rollback.title: One-Click Rollback
rollback.text: Every system generation is preserved. Rollback to any previous state instantly.

modular.title: Modular
modular.text: Reusable modules for common configurations. Enable/disable features easily.

future.title: Future-Proof
future.text: With AI integration and skill system planned, the system will become even more powerful.

modules.title: üß© Modules
modules.subtitle: Explore all NixOS Control Center modules
